briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the directory name.
Gets or sets the directory's path, both renames and modifies the directory's location.
Gets the index inside its parent's respective list

detaileddescription.para: The folder index in the parent or -1 if root directory.

briefdescription.para: Gets the root Filesystem the Directory is within.
Returns FileType.Directory
Casts the Parent FileObject to a Directory
Gets the first T:Pathfinder.GameFilesystem.IFileObject that contains the specified name, searching through files first.
Retrieves a list of Files contained within the Directory.
Retrieves a list of Directories contained within the Directory.
Retrieves the amount of Files within the Directory.
Retrieves the amount of Directories within the Directory.
Finds a File within the Directory based on its name.

simplesect.para: The File or null if not found.

briefdescription.para: Finds a Directory within the Directory based on its name.

simplesect.para: The Directory or null if not found.

briefdescription.para: Searchs for a Directory's path as far as possible.

simplesect.para: The Directory to search for, or the deepest Directory found in the path, or null if nullOut is true.

parameterdescription.para: If set to true ignores the root (/) symbol at the start.
If set to true then nulls out on failure, otherwise returns furthest depth

briefdescription.para: Searchs for a Directory's path as far as possible.

simplesect.para: The Directory to search for, or the deepest Directory found in the path.

briefdescription.para: Searchs for a File's path as far as possible.

simplesect.para: The File to search for, or null if not found.

parameterdescription.para: If set to true ignores the root (/) symbol at the start.

briefdescription.para: Searchs for a File's path as far as possible.

simplesect.para: The File to search for, or null if not found.

briefdescription.para: Gets a File based on its Index.

detaileddescription.para: This method is the most bare and unsafe method of File retrieval

simplesect.para: The File who contains said Index.

briefdescription.para: Gets a Directory based on its Index.

detaileddescription.para: This method is the most bare and unsafe method of Directory retrieval

simplesect.para: The Directory who contains said Index.

briefdescription.para: Creates a new File based on the name and data.

simplesect.para: The File that was created.

parameterdescription.para: The name to assign to the File.
The data to assign to the File.

briefdescription.para: Creates a File based on the name and the Executable.IInterface generated file data.

simplesect.para: The File that was created.

parameterdescription.para: The name to assign to the File.
The Executable.IInterface whose file data is to be generated.

briefdescription.para: Creates an executable File based on the name and the file data string id.

simplesect.para: The executable File that was created.

parameterdescription.para: The name to assign to the File.

briefdescription.para: Creates a vanilla executable File based on the name and the vanilla data index.

simplesect.para: The executable File that was created.

parameterdescription.para: The name to assign to the File.

briefdescription.para: Creates a new Directory based on the name.

simplesect.para: The Directory that was created.

parameterdescription.para: The name to assign to the Directory.

briefdescription.para: Removes a File in the Directory by its name.

simplesect.para: true, if File was found and removed, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Removes a File in the Directory.

simplesect.para: true, if File was found and removed, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Removes a Directory in the Directory by its name.

simplesect.para: true, if Directory was found and removed, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Removes a Directory in the Directory.

simplesect.para: true, if Directory was found and removed, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Moves a File to a new Directory.

simplesect.para: The moved File.

briefdescription.para: Moves a Directory to a new Directory.

simplesect.para: The moved Directory.

briefdescription.para: Moves the Directory to a new Directory.

simplesect.para: The Directory to move to.

briefdescription.para: Determines whether the specified File is contained within the Directory.

simplesect.para: true, if the File isn't null and contained within the Directory, false otherwise.

parameterdescription.para: The File to determine is contained within.

briefdescription.para: Determines whether the specified Directory is contained within the Directory.

simplesect.para: true, if the Directory isn't null and contained within the Directory, false otherwise.

parameterdescription.para: The Directory to determine is contained within.

briefdescription.para: Determines whether a File with the specified name and/or data is contained within the Directory

simplesect.para: true, if File is contained in the Directory, false otherwise.

parameterdescription.para: The name to search for or null.
The data to search for or null.

simplesect.para: true, if Directory is contained in the Directory, false otherwise.

parameterdescription.para: The name to search for or null.
The amount of folders to look for or null.
The amount of files to look for or null.
